explanation: [0-0] A left hand holds a dark gray grinding rod, placing it into a dark gray, almost black, mortar.

[0-3] Then, the left hand removes the grinding rod. Immediately after, a yellow box with a Spiderman logo appears above the mortar. The box is opened, and two hands tear open a white inner packaging, placing two red, blue, and white popsicles into the mortar.

[3-10] Subsequently, the right hand uses the grinding rod to crush the popsicles and stir them into a pink paste.

[10-15] Afterwards, the left hand holds a syringe while the right hand removes the cap. The syringe is placed into the mortar to expel air, then it draws up the paste. The scene then switches to two hands assembling a white machine with a hole and a silver button on top and a face-shaped tray at the bottom. The paste from the syringe is injected into the machine through the hole, followed by a white, oval-shaped tablet.

[15-22] Then, the right hand presses the silver button, and the tray starts to fill with the pink paste. The camera zooms in, revealing a pink facial mask. A pair of hands picks up the mask. The scene changes to show the mask being applied to a man's face. He smiles happily, extends both hands forward, and finally tears off the mask with joy.
